A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It must be tough to deliver under such immense anticipation. 91% feels way too high. The tone was confusing and the story was kind of a mess. It almost felt like a bad Star Wars parody at times. There were a couple of great things\, and they were truly great\, but overall it was a disappointment. The Force Awakens and Rogue One were deserving of their acclaim. This is not. Hopefully the next one gets back on track.
